name: Sonic Retro - Sonic Mania theme
description: This is a theme for the main page, forums, and info pages of Sonic Retro that adds gradients and a Sonic Mania background image/logo. This does spoil things, so only view the settings for this style if you want to be spoiled. The default background picture is Studiopolis Zone.

user.name: Xane Myers (Xane_MM)
user.about: I'm the developer of Magical Mary 1! I've also created userstyles in the past but I haven't updated them in forever. (They might not work as a result.)

additional_info: Updated to work with Sonic Retro's new forum software. Latest update improves the appearance of the reaction list dialog box and adds customizable page width!
